column1: # file for defining the vector logic
# first:   Version (needs to be the same version as the checklist)
# Second:  The vector you are defining
# Third:   The number of classes this rule fulfills
# fourth:  List of course listings that are allowed (e.g. CSxxxx means all CS courses)
# fifth:   The list of forbidden classes despite the rule from the allowed
#   An 'x' in a course listing means that it can be any number
#   An 'f' means that it can be either 4
#       $Renaissance: at least 2 different hundredths digits are represented
